description:
Your Intelligent Assistant for AI PC

Flowy AI analyzes your needs and behavior patterns to provide personalized services, creating a more convenient and efficient smart life experience. The personal intelligence system that unlocks powerful new ways to communicate, work, and express yourself, all while protecting your data with an extraordinary step forward for privacy in AI.
- Added deepseek-R1 model
- Added support for 'think' tag in chatbox
- Fixed known bugs
